body.p: Dr Sir. It would be a convenience to the legal profession and to business ^men^ of this place to have a notary Public here. 's term of office, as notary, having expired, we would respectfully recommend B. E. Pittman, of Greenville, to you for the appointment.John R. Lambuth

Chas Eaves
R. S. Russell
F. B. Hancock
Edward R Weir Jr
W. W. Hancock Jr
M. C Hay
H Bruce
.N. G. Jones
B E Pittman

Muhlenberg
Notary
J. R Lambuth
Comd. Nov 12 1860
